amendment.description: Amendment sought to give DOD authority to transfer funds to nuclear nonproliferation and not just to weapons activities and naval reactors as was allowed for in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 113-455 to allow the transfer of funds to nuclear nonproliferation, not just to weapons activities and naval reactors as is currently allowed for in the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 227 (Roll no. 226).
